distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for openssh fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-14145: Fixed a potential information leak during host key exchange (bsc#1173513).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The client side in OpenSSH 5.7 through 8.4 has an Observable Discrepancy leading to an information leak in the algorithm negotiation. This allows man-in-the-middle attackers to target initial connection attempts (where no host key for the server has been cached by the client). NOTE: some reports state that 8.5 and 8.6 are also affected.
notes.title: CVE description
